comments.body:
```suggestion
export as namespace jCaptcha;
export = jCaptcha;
```
I think this is an UMD module, used in the browser:
https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/declaration-files/templates/module-d-ts.html
https://github.com/robiveli/js-captcha/blob/master/dist/js/index.js
https://unpkg.com/js-captcha@1.3.0/dist/js/index.js
(if accepted, please verify it works locally)
